Notes: Only upping this because we got asked. We highly suggest that you don't download this since the source was
rough, don't say we haven't told you so. First CAM, 3D video, has movement and the odd line of hardcoded subs
We cropped it so that there are no hardcoded subtitles for a large portion of the movie, they do come back slightly
at crooked angles from time to time due to camera movement though. We placed a smooth blur over the watermark at
the top right of the video and that's hardly noticeable now unless you go looking for it. Other than that we just
filtered it, added some colour, resized and then boom. Starts off very shaky. This is a cross between the Godzilla
source and the Spiderman 3D source that went around, you'll get what we mean if you grab this. All in all a
watchable first CAM if you're desperate, we doubt it'll get much better from this source
